sentences.en: A number of people were killed by flying debris.
sentences.cn: 有数人被飞射的碎片击中身亡。

sentences.en: After the bombing there was a lot of debris everywhere.
sentences.cn: 轰炸之后到处瓦砾成堆.

sentences.en: Bacteria sticks to food debris in the teeth, causing decay.
sentences.cn: 细菌附着在牙缝中的食物残渣上, 导致蛀牙.

sentences.en: Emergency teams are still clearing the debris from the plane crash.
sentences.cn: 各抢救小组仍在清理失事飞机的残骸。

sentences.en: Glauconite, detrital carbonate skeletal debris, marine fossils, and collophane are commonly present.
sentences.cn: 海绿石 、 碳酸盐骨骸碎屑 、 海相化石和胶磷矿普遍出现.

sentences.en: He was buried under the debris for several hours.
sentences.cn: 他被埋在废墟下面达好几个小时。

sentences.en: I stood at the foot of the collapsed tower and watched the rescue workers sifting through the debris.
sentences.cn: 我站在倒塌的高塔脚下，看着救援人员在瓦砾堆中搜寻。

sentences.en: On the right was a clutter of pipes and debris.
sentences.cn: 右边是乱七八糟的管子和破碎杂物.

sentences.en: Others are merely accumulations of coral and skeletal debris.
sentences.cn: 而另一些则仅仅是珊瑚和骸骨碎片的堆积.

sentences.en: Others were unlucky victims of falling debris.
sentences.cn: 其他人都是不幸被坠落的瓦砾残片所伤。

sentences.en: Rainfall had dislodged debris from the slopes of the volcano.
sentences.cn: 雨水冲走了火山坡面上的岩屑。

sentences.en: Rapid melting of the snow saturated debris in a large landslide.
sentences.cn: 积雪的急剧融化使大滑坡中的岩屑饱和.

sentences.en: She was hit by flying debris from the blast.
sentences.cn: 她被爆炸产生的飞散碎片击中。

sentences.en: Spencer waded through the debris of broken chairs and beer bottles.
sentences.cn: 斯潘塞艰难地迈过一堆破椅子和碎啤酒瓶。

sentences.en: The sea tided the debris ashore.
sentences.cn: 潮水把碎片杂物冲上海滩.

sentences.en: The streets are still full of debris from two nights of rioting.
sentences.cn: 街道上仍到处可见连续两晚的骚乱留下的残迹。

trans.tran_en: the pieces of something that are left after it has been destroyed in an accident, explosion etc
